titleStmt.title: Edinbvrgh, 4 June 1650. The Estate of Parliament now presently conveened, taking into consideration the necessary duty lying upon them to use their best endeavors for securing of religion and the peace of the kingdom ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first line of text.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
